title: Sweet Curse! Battle-Android summoned to a Different world! - Novel Updates
author: Yugami Hizumi   Yuukigoshi   湯上　日澄
description:
While the Capital of Celephais was collapsing under the siege of the devils, Menes, whom was about to be killed by demons, accidentally summoned an ultimate weapon from another world; An Android!! He summoned guns, missiles and first love! 

Android type 'Fear' VS The curse of the Devil! 

Light and Dark love ! 

'When this battle is over, will you see me properly?'>
